remarks: A commutative/associative law for division.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
div1d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
divcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
divmuld.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
divassd.4 $e |- ( ph -> C =/= 0 ) $.
div23d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A x. B ) / C ) = ( ( A / C ) x. B ) ) $.
